name: Dr. Maxim Orlovsky
cooked: For instance, we work on a number of Layer 2 and 3 Bitcoin protocols, including RGB smart contracts, new rust Lightning implementation (LNP), bitcoin-bases self-sovereign identitites (SSI) etc. What is the best category to post announcements about the new releases of such libraries and tools?
topic_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
topic_html_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
raw: For instance, we work on a number of Layer 2 and 3 Bitcoin protocols, including RGB smart contracts, new rust Lightning implementation (LNP), bitcoin-bases self-sovereign identitites (SSI) etc. What is the best category to post announcements about the new releases of such libraries and tools?
